baseline_groups.claim_summary: Emoticon feedback improves subsequent exam scores (log test) relative to numeric-only feedback.
baseline_groups.notes: Panel FE DiD with name_id FE, robust SE. Coef=0.0226, p=0.084.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Emoticon feedback improves quiz scores conditional on attendance.
baseline_groups.notes: Secondary outcome. Coef=0.158, p<0.001. Pre-quiz placebo is significant (p=0.009).

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Emoticon feedback affects homework attempt rates.

global_notes: Multiple outcomes examined. Primary claim is exam scores (G1). The cluster(treatment) spec is invalid (degenerate with 2 clusters). Pre-quiz placebo is significant (p=0.009), raising parallel trends concerns for quiz outcome.
